thread.title: BRIEF-NFI Group Says At End Of Q1 2018, Total Backlog Was 11,548 EUS Vs. 9,984 EUS

title: BRIEF-NFI Group Says At End Of Q1 2018, Total Backlog Was 11,548 EUS Vs. 9,984 EUS

organizations.name: brief-nfi group says at end of

text:
April 15 (Reuters) - New Flyer Industries Inc:
* NFI GROUP ANNOUNCES Q1 2018 ORDERS AND BACKLOG * GROUP DELIVERED 993 EQUIVALENT UNITS (“EUS”) IN Q1 2018, AN INCREASE OF 101 EUS COMPARED TO Q1 2017
* TOTAL INVENTORY AT APRIL 1, 2018 INCREASED 151 EUS FROM PREVIOUS QUARTER TO 633 EUS
* TOTAL NEW ORDERS IN Q1 2018 TOTALED 736 EUS, WHICH INCLUDED FIRM ORDERS OF 365 EUS (VALUED AT $160.1 MILLION)
* NEW FLYER INDUSTRIES - AT END OF Q1 2018, TOTAL BACKLOG WAS 11,548 EUS (VALUED AT $5.8 BILLION) VERSUS. 9,984 EUS (VALUED AT $5.1 BILLION) AT END OF Q1 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
